songs.title: Prisoner
songs.embed_content: Read “Prisoner” by Ryan Adams on Genius
songs.lyrics:
7 ContributorsPrisoner Lyrics[Verse 1]
Free my heart
Somebody locked it up
Still waiting on parole
I can taste the freedom just outside that door
Same grey walls
Same grey clothes
Mmm, I know my friends all know
Can't keep it under control

[Chorus]
I know our love is wrong
I am a criminal
Mmm, I am a prisoner
Mmm, I am a prisoner
For your love

[Verse 2]
There's this one bird
Lands on the sill beside the bars
How can something born with wings
Ever know freedom to truly be free
Clock don't know what your memories do
They're stacking up beside the bed
I count 'em every night inside my head
You might also like[Chorus]
If loving you is wrong
I am a criminal
Mmm, I am a prisoner
Mmm, I am a prisoner
If loving you is wrong
I am a criminal
Mmm, I am a prisoner
Mmm, I am a prisoner
For your loveEmbed

songs.full_title: To Be Without You by Ryan Adams
songs.title: To Be Without You
songs.embed_content: Read “To Be Without You” by Ryan Adams on Genius

annotatable.link_title: To Be Without You by Ryan Adams
annotatable.title: To Be Without You

songs.lyrics:
8 ContributorsTo Be Without You Lyrics[Verse 1]
It's so hard to be without you
Lying in the bed, you are so much to be without
Rattles in my head that empty drum filled with doubt
Everything you lose, the wisdom will find its way out
Every night is lonesome and is longer than before
Nothing really matters anymore

[Verse 2]
It's so hard to be without you
Used to feel so angry, and now I only feel humble
Stinging from the storm inside my ribs where it thunders
Nothing left to say or really even wonder
We are like a book and every page is so torn
Nothing really matters anymore

[Verse 3]
It's so hard not to call you
Thunders in my bones out in the streets where I first saw you
When everything was new and colorful, it's gotten darker
Every day's a lesson, things were brighter before
Nothing really matters anymore

[Verse 4]
It's so hard to be without you
Everyday I find another little thread of silver
Waiting for me when I wake some place on the pillow
And then I see the empty space beside me and remember
I feel empty, I feel tired, I feel worn
Nothing really matters anymoreYou might also likeEmbed

songs.full_title: Come Pick Me Up by Ryan Adams
songs.title: Come Pick Me Up
songs.embed_content: Read “Come Pick Me Up” by Ryan Adams on Genius

annotatable.link_title: Come Pick Me Up by Ryan Adams
annotatable.title: Come Pick Me Up

songs.lyrics:
15 ContributorsCome Pick Me Up Lyrics[Verse 1]
When they call your name, will you walk right up
With a smile on your face?
Will you cower in fear in your favorite sweater
With an old love letter?

[Pre-Chorus 1]
I wish you would
I wish you would

[Chorus 1]
Come pick me up, take me out
Fuck me up, steal my records
Screw all my friends, they're all full of shit
With a smile on your face, and then do it again
I wish you would

[Verse 2]
When you're walking down town, do you wish I was there?
Do you wish it was me?
With the windows clear, and the mannequins' eyes
Do they all look like mine?

[Pre-Chorus 2]
You know you could
I wish you would
You might also like[Chorus 2]
Come pick me up, take me out
Fuck me up, steal my records
Screw all my friends behind my back
With a smile on your face, and then do it again
I wish you would

[Outro]
I wish you'd make up my bed
So I could make up my mind
Try it for sleeping instead
Maybe you'll rest sometime
I wish I could
I wish I could
I wish I could4Embed
